amendment.description: Amendment sought to require GAO to conduct a study on the resiliency and adaptability of all Bureau of Reclamation projects and facilities to any ongoing or forecasted changes to the quality, quantity, or reliability of water resources.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in Part B of House Report 113-340 to require GAO to conduct a study on the resiliency and adaptability of all Bureau of Reclamation projects and facilities to any ongoing or forecasted changes to the quality, quantity, or reliability of water resources.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Capps amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 194 - 227 (Roll no. 45).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Capps amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 194 - 227 (Roll no. 45).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A004) offered by Mrs. Capps.
